projects.title: PHP Dev Box
projects.description: Containerized PHP development environment for core development and extension building.
projects.longDescription: A complete PHP development environment with Docker, featuring Laravel, Symfony, and modern PHP tools. Perfect for local development and testing.

projects.title: CSVHelper
projects.description: High-performance PHP CSV processing library with advanced parsing capabilities.
projects.longDescription: A modern, high-performance CSV processing library for PHP that automatically selects the best available implementation. CsvHelper provides a unified interface for reading and writing CSV files, with automatic fallback between the FastCSV extension (when available) and PHP's built-in SplFileObject.

projects.title: Cventure
projects.description: Interactive C programming learning platform with hands-on exercises.
projects.longDescription: CV management platform built with modern PHP and clean architecture principles. Features template management and PDF generation.

projects.title: MacDotfile
projects.description: Comprehensive macOS dotfiles configuration with automated setup scripts.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive macOS dotfiles configuration with automated setup scripts. Includes development tools, shell configuration, and productivity apps.

projects.title: LaTeX CV Docker Image
projects.description: Docker image for generating professional CVs using LaTeX with custom templates.
projects.longDescription: Docker image for generating professional CVs using LaTeX. Includes custom templates and automated compilation pipeline.

projects.title: FastCSV-C
projects.description: High-performance, safe, and portable CSV library in C for use in any language.
projects.longDescription: FastCSV-C is a fast, safe CSV library written in C, designed for easy integration with PHP, Python, and other languages. It features arena-based memory management, a simple API, and is ideal for building high-performance extensions.

projects.title: FastCSV-ext
projects.description: High-performance PHP extension for CSV processing powered by FastCSV-C.
projects.longDescription: FastCSV-ext is a PHP extension that brings the speed and safety of FastCSV-C to PHP. It provides a native interface for fast CSV reading and writing, with minimal overhead and seamless integration into PHP projects.
